trans-unit.source: The type of the values provided in the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.ParallelForEach`1.Values" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.ParallelForEach`1.Values" /> 集合中提供的值型別。

trans-unit.source: Enumerates the elements of a collection and executes an embedded statement for each element of the collection in parallel.
trans-unit.target: 列舉集合項目，並針對集合的每個項目平行執行內嵌陳述式。

trans-unit.source: The embedded statements are scheduled together and run asynchronously, but unless the scheduled activites themselves are asynchronous (such as messaging activities, <xref:System.Activities.Statements.InvokeMethod>, or activities that derive from <xref:System.Activities.AsyncCodeActivity>), they do not run on separate threads, so each successive activity will only execute when the previously scheduled activity completes or goes idle.
trans-unit.target: 內嵌陳述式會一起進行排程並以非同步方式執行，但是除非排程的活動本身也是非同步的 (例如訊息活動、<xref:System.Activities.Statements.InvokeMethod> 或衍生自 <xref:System.Activities.AsyncCodeActivity> 的活動)，否則它們不會在個別的執行緒上執行，因此每個後續活動都只會在先前排程的活動完成或閒置時才會執行。

trans-unit.source: If none of the child activities of this activity are asynchronous or go idle, this activity execute in the same way that a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.ForEach%601> activity does.
trans-unit.target: 如果此活動沒有非同步或閒置的子活動，則會使用與執行 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.ForEach%601> 活動相同的方式來執行此活動。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates creating a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.ParallelForEach%601> activity.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.ParallelForEach%601> 活動。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Corporate Purchase Process](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/corporate-purchase-process.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例取自[公司購買程序](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/corporate-purchase-process.md)範例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.ParallelForEach`1" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.ParallelForEach`1" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates creating a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.ParallelForEach%601> activity.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.ParallelForEach%601> 活動。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Corporate Purchase Process](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/corporate-purchase-process.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例取自[公司購買程序](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/corporate-purchase-process.md)範例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityAction" /> that is executed once for every value contained in the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.ParallelForEach`1.Values" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 針對 <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityAction" /> 集合中包含的每個值執行一次的 <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.ParallelForEach`1.Values" />。

trans-unit.source: The contained activity action.
trans-unit.target: 包含的活動動作。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates setting the Body property of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.ParallelForEach%601> activity.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.ParallelForEach%601> 活動的 Body 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Corporate Purchase Process](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/corporate-purchase-process.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例取自[公司購買程序](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/corporate-purchase-process.md)範例。

trans-unit.source: Evaluated after each iteration completes.
trans-unit.target: 在每個反覆運算完成之後評估。

trans-unit.source: The completion expression.
trans-unit.target: 完成運算式。

trans-unit.source: If it evaluates to `true`, then the scheduled pending iterations are canceled.
trans-unit.target: 如果評估為 `true`，則會取消已排程的擱置中反覆運算。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, all scheduled statements execute until completion.
trans-unit.target: 如果並未設定此屬性，則會執行所有已排程的陳述式，直到完成為止。

trans-unit.source: The collection of values used as parameters for each iteration of the activity contained in the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.ParallelForEach`1.Body" />.
trans-unit.target: 做為 <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.ParallelForEach`1.Body" /> 包含的每個活動反覆項目之參數使用的值集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of values.
trans-unit.target: 值的集合。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.ParallelForEach%601> 活動的 Values 屬性。

trans-unit.target: 這個範例取自[公司購買程序](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/corporate-purchase-process.md)範例。
